Interface Device

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Description
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AnnotatedDevice
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    @XmlNs(value="urn:schemas-upnp-org:device-1-0")
public interface Device
extends Description
    UPnP device interface.

    $Revision: 6332 $
    Author:
    Allen D. Ball
